subject: Fwd: Reservation confirmed - James Smith Sr arrives Jan 12
body:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Airbnb <automated@airbnb.com>
Date: Fri, Jan 12, 2024 at 2:31 PM
Subject: Reservation confirmed - James Smith Sr arrives Jan 12
To: <tester@example.com>


[image: Airbnb]
<https://www.airbnb.com/?c=.ab12.abc123=&euid=abc-123>

New booking confirmed! James arrives Jan 12.

Send a message to confirm check-in details or welcome James.
<https://www.airbnb.com/hosting/reservations/details/HMXXX24X7Z?c=.ab12.abc123=&euid=abc-123>

James
<https://www.airbnb.com/hosting/reservations/details/HMXXX24X7Z?c=.ab12.abc123=&euid=abc-123>

Identity verified · 10 reviews

Testing, TX
Send James a Message
<https://www.airbnb.com/hosting/thread/1695716963?c=.ab12.abc123=&euid=abc-123&thread_type=home_booking&email_cta=link_hosting_message_thread>
[image: Some Cabin]
<https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/0000?c=.ab12.abc123=&euid=abc-123>

Some Cabin

Entire home/apt
<https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/0000?c=.ab12.abc123=&euid=abc-123>

Check-in
Fri, Jan 12

4:00 PM

Checkout
Sat, Jan 13

11:00 AM
Guests

1 adult
More details about who’s coming

Guests will now let you know if they’re bringing children and infants. Let
them know upfront if your listing is suitable for children by updating your
House Rules.
<https://www.airbnb.com/hosting/listings/0000/details/safety-info>
Confirmation code

HMXXX24X7Z
View itinerary
<https://www.airbnb.com/hosting/reservations/details/HMXXX24X7Z?c=.ab12.abc123=&euid=abc-123>

$165.00

$40.24

$32.78
Total (USD)
$358.02
Host payout

$165.00 x 1 night

$165.00

Cleaning fee

$120.00

Service fee

-$8.55
Total (USD)
$276.45

The money you earn hosting will be sent to you 24 hours after your guest
arrives. You can check your upcoming payments in your Transaction History
<https://www.airbnb.com/users/transaction_history>.

Your guest paid $32.78 in Occupancy Taxes. Airbnb remits these taxes on
your behalf.
Cancellations

Your cancellation policy for guests is Firm
<https://www.airbnb.com/help/article/149>.

The penalties for canceling this reservation include getting a public
review that shows you canceled, paying a cancellation fee, and having the
canceled nights blocked on your calendar.
Read cancellation penalties
<https://www.airbnb.com/help/article/990?c=.ab12.abc123=&euid=abc-123>

Get ready for James’s arrival
Review the COVID-19 safety practices

We’ve created a set of mandatory COVID-19 safety practices for both Airbnb
hosts and guests. These include practicing social distancing and wearing a
mask.
Review practices
<https://www.airbnb.com/help/article/2839?c=.ab12.abc123=&euid=abc-123>

Follow the 5-step enhanced cleaning process

All hosts are required to follow the enhanced cleaning process between
guest stays. They were developed in partnership with experts in an effort
to curb the spread of COVID-19.
Review process
<https://www.airbnb.com/help/article/2809?c=.ab12.abc123=&euid=abc-123>

Provide directions

Check that your guest knows how to get to your place.
Send message
<https://www.airbnb.com/hosting/thread/1695716963?c=.ab12.abc123=&euid=abc-123&thread_type=home_booking>
[image: AirCover for Hosts]

Top-to-bottom protection, included every time you host.
Learn more
<https://www.airbnb.com/help/article/3142/getting-protected-through-aircover-for-hosts?c=.ab12.abc123=&euid=abc-123&email_cta=>

Customer support

Contact our support team 24/7 from anywhere in the world.
